text: "New York Raining" is a song from American rapper Charles Hamilton featuring vocals from British singer Rita Ora. The track was released on March 18, 2015. The track appears on the deluxe edition of the season one soundtrack for Fox's TV series Empire. ==Track listing== *Digital download #"New York Raining" – 3:34 *Digital download – Remixes #"New York Raining" (Culture Shock Remix) – 4:19 #"New York Raining" (Lucky Charmes Remix) – 4:11 ==Charts== {|class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- !
